title: Important Sounds
body:
I find it annoying in champ select there is no option to choose which sounds you hear. You either need to turn the sound the whole way up and listen to the loud champion pick/ban sounds in order to hear when its your turn to pick or can turn the sounds off and risk accidentally dodging because you don't realize its your turn. 

I think it would be a good idea to add "important sounds" as an option that only shows sounds crucial for you as a player (eg, when que comes up, when its your turn to lock in a pick/ban and start of game). This would fix lots of issues and increase the playing experience for many people who watch videos and what not between games.
